name: David Llanos LÃ³pez
title: Senior Front End Developer
about:
Senior front end developer with 8+ years of experience building websites and interactive user experiences.
Interested in Clean Code, Test Driven Development, Web Components, Design Systems, Artificial Intelligence and Game Development.

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description:
ReHub
The project consisted in the creation of a digital solution for home-based rehabilitation. My duties involved creating and mantaining an Angular project from scratch. WebSockets, WebAssembly, Canvas, Web Components, Vue, AWS, Jest, Cypress, MediaPipe

experience.title: Game Developer
experience.description:
City Nostra
The project consisted in the creation of a location-based game with a mafia theme. My duties involved creating from scratch the Android of the game. Some of the tools I used were Parse as the back end server, Mapbox as the map renderer, Uservoice as user feedback manager and Crashlytics as crash reporting tool.

Beaconing - Context Aware Challenges Authoring Tool
The project consisted in creating a platform for teachers to create location-based games. My duties involved creating the front end, made with Bootstrap and jQuery. And the back end, made with PHP.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer - Freelance
experience.description: The project consisted in the creation of a website for a wood flooring company. My duties involved creating the front and back end as well as mantaining the website. The stack I used was composed of Express.js as back end framework, Parse as database and Bootstrap as front end framework.

experience.title: Android and iOS Developer - Internship
experience.description: My duties involved creating both an Android and iOS app from scratch with user management and push notifications. I also made part of the API in the back end to be consumed by the apps.

projects.title: Final Degree Project
projects.description: The project consisted in the creation of a website where you can create facial avatars in pixel art style with realtime face tracking using Vue and MediaPipe: https://davidllanos22.github.io/tfg

projects.title: Game Jams
projects.description: I participated many times in game jams such as Ludum Dare and Global Game Jam.
